existingExercise.title: Existing Exercise
existingExercise.description: Choose and remember your training names more easily.

chooseExercise.title: Choose Exercise
chooseExercise.description: Exercise with the same name will be compared.

trainingContent.title: Training Content
trainingContent.description: Your training content will be analyzed

removeExercise.title: Remove your exercise
removeExercise.description: Removing a training exercise will not lose its records; it just means you can no longer select it in the selector.

currentSession.title: Current Session
currentSession.description: If you are currently training, the records you add will be grouped into the current session.
